oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of aqua-soluble compounds based on vitamin A series molecules: synthetic transformation OF beta-ionone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LIBSU, S
SINGH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: disaccharide glycoside
raspberry fruits
beta-ionone
radioprotective agents
vitamin a compounds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several Compounds bearing hydrophilic moieties like a carbohydrate, amine, phosphate and amino acid have been prepared and characterized. The solubilisation behavior of these compounds has been examined by studying their UV-ViS absorption behavior in micelles.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 46(8), 1297-1302
